content: there are so many very pretty self-patterning yarns available now it means that you can make lovely garments without having to use lacy or complicated stitches i love to use stitches that i haven t done before - but sometimes there is satisfaction in doing simple plain stocking stitch it s important to choose a nice design shape that you like ~ that way you will be happy with the results this cute little baby vest top is knitted all in one piece and there are no seams - perfect for those who hate sewing up **this pattern design is dedicated to sandy in texas** **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
